title: Annapurna Base Camp Trek
overview: Captivating journey through rhododendron forests, Gurung villages, and alpine meadows.
Sunrise over the Annapurna amphitheater is a highlight.
Suitable for trekkers of all levels with cozy tea houses along the way.
